summary: Based upon the life of actress Parveen Babi, this film describes the life of a schizophrenic actress Sana Azim, and the love of her life - Aditya Garewal.
cast: Kangana Ranaut|Shiney Ahuja|Shaad Randhawa|Purab Kohli|Masumeh Makhija|Anita Wahi|Ram Prakash|Preeti Koppikar|Abbas|Sunil Bob|Nilofer Khan|Neeraj Khetrapal
title: Woh Lamhe
